function.name: humidity_setValue
function.description: This function is used to set the humidity level of a SmartThings device.

location.description: The location where the device is located.

room.description: The room where the device is located.

device.description: The name or type of the device to set the humidity level.

ration.description: The percentage value to set the humidity to.

humidity.description: The specific humidity level to set.
